inclusion.criterion: cardiac PET stress test (PET 1) followed by mechanical revascularization as part of their routine medical care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: second cardiac PET stress test (PET 2) within 12 weeks of their revascularization procedure(s)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurements Baseline absolute coronary flow and CFR will be obtained for each major coronary artery territory
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: absolute flow data is not available on the initial PET stress.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He underwent Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis, L>R.
